description: When Scott Hogan is taken by the big boss Chance Caldwell and his henchmen, he is bound, gagged, and abused verbally and physically by Dolph Knight who is in search of a roll of film.  In the process, Knight reduces his captive's ass into a mere sex hole.
series: The Abduction Series, Part I - The Abduction
title: The Abduction Series, Part I - The Abduction
